text: Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL771JM-DH71 17.3" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4710HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It performance throttles under load frequently when playing Starfield, and the performance throttles significantly. The build material has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL771JM-DH71 17.3" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4710HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. performance throttles under load and the speakers feels cheap. Performance in competitive gaming is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL771JM-DH71 17.3" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4710HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It blue screens occasionally frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The port selection has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.

Had several issues with the ASUS ROG GL771JM-DH71 17.3" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4710HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop since day one. blue screens occasionally and the build material feels cheap. Performance in streaming games is not as advertised. Regret this purchase.

Quite disappointed with this laptop, the ASUS ROG GL771JM-DH71 17.3" Intel Core i7 4th Gen 4710HQ (2.50 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 860M 12 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 8.1 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. It overheats frequently when playing Elden Ring, and the performance throttles significantly. The fan noise has been a letdown. Wouldn't recommend.
